sentences.sCn: “我已经开始晕船了。”她抱怨道。

sentences.sContent: He moaned and groaned all the way there.
sentences.sCn: 他去的一路上抱怨个没完。

remMethod.val: 你是否听见月亮(moon)上嫦娥的哀怨(moan)

trans.tranOther: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason
to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason

trans.tranCn: 呻吟声， 呜咽声； 怨声， 牢骚
trans.tranOther: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure
